lead_paragraph: For old-school public relations kingpin Eli Wurman (Pacino), theres never been a crisis he couldnt fix or a scandal he couldnt handleuntil now. When Elis best client (Ryan ONeal, TVs Bones) and his starlet girlfriend (Téa Leoni, Spanglish) become ta
